title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler
description: There is a missing popup menu in the Java editor ruler in the Photon version.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
This should open a popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc., but it does not.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear allowing users to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A popup menu should appear.
Actual: No popup menu is shown.
